[vc_row 0="" full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1509003541153{background-image: url(http://thetechfixers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/img_4.jpg?id=299) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][vc_column width="5/12" icons_position="left"]

[/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" icons_position="left" offset="vc_col-sm-offset-1"]

We Can Fix It!

Our prices for iPhone repairs are competitive with anyone in the city. We repair cracked screens for all models of iPhones and repair broken buttons, speakers and cameras as well. Cracked screen on your new iPhone? We fix that.

[/vc_column][vc_column icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" equal_height="yes"][/vc_row][vc_column icons_position="left"][/vc_column]
[vc_column_inner width="1/3" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" icons_position="left" css=".vc_custom_1509019663453{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_message closeable=""]

Please text or call us at

540-785-3581. Our email is techfix@thetechfixers.com Physical Address 1990 William Street Fredericksburg Va, 22401[/vc_message][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" icons_position="left" css=".vc_custom_1509019672721{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_empty_space hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="" icons_position="left" css=".vc_custom_1509019680341{padding-right: 15px !important;padding-left: 15px !important;}"][vc_message css_animation="appear" closeable="" css=".vc_custom_1676660777183{background-color: #1e1e1e !important;}"]

Hi there, thank you for visiting Techfix. The previous location of our company was in the Spotsylvania mall, across from Dick's Sporting Goods. Sadly, we had to relocate to fulfill our contractual obligations to the Spotsylvania  mall. We have recently secured a new location on Route 3 inside the Westwood Village plaza across the street from Staples and Starbucks. The physical address is 1990 William Street Fredericksburg, VA, 22401. Our telephone number has not changed. 540-785-3581  Please text or call us for quotes or services. Thank you for choosing Techfix for all your gadget repairs. We hope to continue to serve the Fredericksburg area and continue to grow with your continued support.

[/vc_message][/vc_column_inner]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" hide_bg_image_on_tablet="" hide_bg_image_on_mobile="1" css=".vc_custom_1509116227682{background: #f4f4f4 url(http://thetechfixers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/img_2.jpg?id=315) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" icons_position="left" offset="vc_col-sm-offset-6"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1508833829486{margin-top: 1.1rem !important;}"]

Why Choose Us?

Same Day Repairs

When your phone breaks, you don’t want it fixed tomorrow—you need it fixed today.

Low Price Guarantee

Repairing beats replacing, and FixTeam beats all other phone repair companies.

Superior Warranty

Stronger than any phone case, FixTeam offers the most reliable warranty on the market.

[vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1508836197341{margin-top: -0.85rem !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1501675065327{background-image: url(http://thetechfixers.com/wp-content/uploads/2017/08/img_3.jpg?id=282) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" icons_position="left"][vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile=""]

Our Repairs Mean Business.

[vc_empty_space alter_height="small" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009269366{margin-top: 0.4rem !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1571240922487{padding-right: 4rem !important;}"]Broken and slow-performing devices can grind productivity down to a halt for big and small companies. Techfix can get business booming again.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space alter_height="small" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009328296{margin-top: 0.75rem !important;}"]Contact Us[vc_empty_space alter_height="huge" hide_on_desktop="" hide_on_notebook="" hide_on_tablet="" hide_on_mobile="" css=".vc_custom_1509009355105{margin-top: 0.5rem !important;}"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row]
